resources.string: Your USIM card is PUK-locked. Type the PUK code to unlock it.
Type PUK2 to unblock USIM card.
Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your tablet or USIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.
Allows application to read SMS messages stored on your phone or USIM card. Malicious applications may read your confidential messages.
Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your tablet or USIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.
Allows application to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or USIM card. Malicious applications may delete your messages.
The USIM card is missing or not readable. Please insert a USIM card.
Your USIM card is permanently disabled.\n Please contact your wireless service provider to obtain another USIM card.
The mobile network will be unavailable until you restart with a valid USIM card inserted.
